overview: Ian has been in the IT arena for over 20 years, starting his career in IT sales with Torus in the 80’s (first to sell NetWare in the UK and one of only three Microsoft LAN Manager 1.0 OEMs). He has worked for many enterprise software companies, typically North American companies establishing a presence in Europe, before he founded Emporia in 1998 (later ultimattely sold to Entegrity Solutions), Entelegen in 2002 and WeCanDo.BIZ in 2008. He retains senior management positions in Entelegen and WeCanDo.BIZ.
